verses.verse: וִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> Now Jericho סֹגֶ֣רֶת <WH5462> was straitly וּמְסֻגֶּ֔רֶת <WH5462> shut up מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֵ֥ין <WH369> no יוֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> none went out וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> one בָּֽא׃ <WH935> and none came in ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua רְאֵה֙ <WH7200> See נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> I have given בְיָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> into thine hand אֶת־ <WH853> יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> Jericho וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּ֑הּ <WH4428> and the king גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <WH1368> thereof [and] the mighty men הֶחָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> of valour

וְסַבֹּתֶ֣ם <WH5437> And ye shall compass אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> the city כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of war הַקֵּ֥יף <WH5362> [and] go round about אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> anvil אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> a כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> so תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> Thus shalt thou do שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> six יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> And seven כֹהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> priests יִשְׂאוּ֩ <WH5375> shall bear שִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <WH7782> trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <WH3104> of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָאָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> and the seventh תָּסֹ֥בּוּ <WH5437> ye shall compass אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> and the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> shall blow בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> with the trumpets

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become בִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ ׀ <WH4900> And it shall come to pass that when they make a long בְּקֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> horn הַיּוֹבֵ֗ל <WH3104> [blast] with the ram's [בְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם כ] (כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <WH8085> listen ק) אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> of the trumpet יָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> shall shout כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people תְּרוּעָ֣ה <WH8643> shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> with a great וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <WH5307> shall fall down חוֹמַ֤ת <WH2346> and the wall הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <WH8478> flat וְעָל֥וּ <WH5927> shall ascend up הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5048> straight

וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נוּן֙ <WH5126> of Nun אֶל־ <WH413> about הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to שְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> unto them Take up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הַבְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> of the covenant וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> and let seven כֹֽהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> priests יִשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> bear שִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> seven שֽׁוֹפְרוֹת֙ <WH7782> trumpets יוֹבְלִ֔ים <WH3104> of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

[וַיֹּאמְרוּ כ] (וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> answer ק) אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people עִבְר֖וּ <WH5674> Pass on וְסֹ֣בּוּ <WH5437> and compass אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city וְהֶ֣חָל֔וּץ <WH2502> and let him that is armed יַעֲבֹ֕ר <WH5674> pass on לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כֶּאֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> had spoken יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> And it came to pass when Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֒ <WH5971> unto the people וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> that the seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <WH5375> bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> the seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <WH7782> trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <WH3104> of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עָבְר֕וּ <WH5674> passed on וְתָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> and blew בַּשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> with the trumpets וַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> and the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> followed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> them

וְהֶחָל֣וּץ <WH2502> And the armed הֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> men went לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests [תָּקְעוּ כ] (תֹּקְעֵ֖י <WH8628> blew ק) הַשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> with the trumpets וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <WH622> and the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> came אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הָאָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark הָל֖וֹךְ <WH1980> [the priests] going on וְתָק֥וֹעַ <WH8628> and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> with the trumpets

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֩ <WH5971> the people צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH7321> Ye shall not shout וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <WH8085> nor make any noise אֶת־ <WH853> קוֹלְכֶ֔ם <WH6963> with your voice וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> proceed מִפִּיכֶ֖ם <WH6310> out of your mouth דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> neither shall [any] word עַ֠ד <WH5704> until י֣וֹם <WH3117> until the day אָמְרִ֧י <WH559> I bid אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH413> about הָרִ֖יעוּ <WH7321> you shout וַהֲרִיעֹתֶֽם׃ <WH7321> then shall ye shout

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <WH5437> compassed אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> So the ark יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> the city הַקֵּ֖ף <WH5362> going about פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> anvil אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> they וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and they came הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> into the camp וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <WH3885> and lodged בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> in the camp פ

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> rose early יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> took up הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> And seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <WH5375> bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> seven שׁוֹפְר֜וֹת <WH7782> trumpets הַיֹּבְלִ֗ים <WH3104> of rams' horns לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> went on הָל֔וֹךְ <WH1980> continually וְתָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> with the trumpets וְהֶחָלוּץ֙ <WH2502> and the armed men הֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <WH622> them but the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD [הֹולֵךְ כ] (הָלֹ֖וךְ <WH1980> came ק) וְתָק֥וֹעַ <WH8628> and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> with the trumpets

וַיָּסֹ֨בּוּ <WH5437> they compassed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> the city בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> And the second פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> anvil אַחַ֔ת <WH259> a וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> and returned הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> into the camp כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> so עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> so they did שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> six יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> And it came to pass on the seventh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙מוּ֙ <WH7925> that they rose early כַּעֲל֣וֹת <WH7837> of the day הַשַּׁ֔חַר <WH7837> of the day וַיָּסֹ֧בּוּ <WH5437> and compassed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֛יר <WH5892> the city כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> after the same manner הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> the same שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times רַ֚ק <WH7535> that בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> only on that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he סָבְב֥וּ <WH5437> they compassed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <WH6471> times

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> time הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ית <WH7637> And it came to pass at the seventh תָּקְע֥וּ <WH8628> blew הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> when the priests בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> with the trumpets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֙ <WH5971> unto the people הָרִ֔יעוּ <WH7321> Shout כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> for the LORD לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> you the city

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> become הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> And the city חֵ֛רֶם <WH2764> shall be accursed הִ֥יא <WH1931> it וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֖הּ לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [even] it and all that [are] therein to the LORD רַק֩ <WH7535> but רָחָ֨ב <WH7343> only Rahab הַזּוֹנָ֜ה <WH2181> the harlot תִּֽחְיֶ֗ה <WH2421> shall live הִ֚יא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom אִתָּ֣הּ <WH854> her in בַּבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> she and all that [are] with her in the house כִּ֣י <WH3588> because הֶחְבְּאַ֔תָה <WH2244> because she hid אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> the messengers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom שָׁלָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH7971> that we sent

וְרַק־ <WH7535> And ye in any wise אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you שִׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> keep מִן־ <WH4480> some הַחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> [yourselves] from the accursed thing פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> so תַּחֲרִ֖ימוּ <WH2763> lest ye make [yourselves] accursed וּלְקַחְתֶּ֣ם <WH3947> when ye take מִן־ <WH4480> some הַחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> of the accursed thing וְשַׂמְתֶּ֞ם <WH7760> and make אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֤ה <WH4264> the camp יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לְחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> a curse וַעֲכַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH5916> and trouble אוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> But all the silver וְזָהָ֗ב <WH2091> and gold וּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> and vessels נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> of brass וּבַרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> and iron קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> [are] consecrated ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אוֹצַ֥ר <WH214> into the treasury יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> they shall come

וַיָּ֣רַע <WH7321> shouted הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> So the people וַֽיִּתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> when [the priests] blew בַּשֹּֽׁפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> with the trumpets וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> and it came to pass when the people אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֗ר <WH7782> of the trumpet וַיָּרִ֤יעוּ <WH7321> shouted הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people תְּרוּעָ֣ה <WH8643> shout גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> with a great וַתִּפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> fell down flat הַֽחוֹמָ֜ה <WH2346> that the wall תַּחְתֶּ֗יהָ <WH8478> flat וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> went up הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> so that the people הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <WH5892> into the city אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man נֶגְדּ֔וֹ <WH5048> straight וַֽיִּלְכְּד֖וּ <WH3920> straight before him and they took אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַֽיַּחֲרִ֙ימוּ֙ <WH2763> And they utterly destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> it בָּעִ֔יר <WH5892> all that [was] in the city מֵאִישׁ֙ <WH376> both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> against אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> and woman מִנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> young וְעַד־ <WH5704> against זָקֵ֑ן <WH2205> and old וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> against שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> and ox וָשֶׂ֛ה <WH7716> and sheep וַחֲמ֖וֹר <WH2543> and ass לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

וְלִשְׁנַ֨יִם <WH8147> unto the two הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH582> men הַֽמְרַגְּלִ֤ים <WH7270> that had spied out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the country אָמַ֣ר <WH559> had said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> But Joshua בֹּ֖אוּ <WH935> Go בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> thence the woman הַזּוֹנָ֑ה <WH2181> into the harlot's וְהוֹצִ֨יאוּ <WH3318> and bring out מִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> of there אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> the woman וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you נִשְׁבַּעְתֶּ֖ם <WH7650> and all that she hath as ye sware לָֽהּ׃

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> went in הַנְּעָרִ֣ים <WH5288> And the young men הַֽמְרַגְּלִ֗ים <WH7270> that were spies וַיֹּצִ֡יאוּ <WH3318> and brought out אֶת־ <WH853> רָ֠חָב <WH7343> Rahab וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֨יהָ <WH1> and her father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמָּ֤הּ <WH517> and her mother וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH251> and her brethren וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לָ֔הּ וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִשְׁפְּחוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH4940> all her kindred הוֹצִ֑יאוּ <WH3318> and all that she had and they brought out וַיַּ֨נִּיח֔וּם <WH3240> and left מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> them without לְמַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> the camp יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהָעִ֛יר <WH5892> the city שָׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> And they burnt בָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> with fire וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֑הּ רַ֣ק ׀ <WH7535> but הַכֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> and all that [was] therein only the silver וְהַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> and the gold וּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> and the vessels הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> of brass וְהַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> and of iron נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they put אוֹצַ֥ר <WH214> into the treasury בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> רָחָ֣ב <WH7343> Rahab הַ֠זּוֹנָה <WH2181> the harlot וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> household אָבִ֤יהָ <WH1> and her father's וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom לָהּ֙ הֶחֱיָ֣ה <WH2421> alive יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> and all that she had and she dwelleth בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הֶחְבִּ֙יאָה֙ <WH2244> because she hid אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> the messengers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> which Joshua לְרַגֵּ֥ל <WH7270> to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> Jericho פ

וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> adjured יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> [them] at that time הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אָר֨וּר <WH779> Cursed הָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> [be] the man לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יָקוּם֙ <WH6965> that riseth up וּבָנָ֞ה <WH1129> and buildeth אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise אֶת־ <WH853> יְרִיח֔וֹ <WH3405> Jericho בִּבְכֹר֣וֹ <WH1060> thereof in his firstborn יְיַסְּדֶ֔נָּה <WH3245> he shall lay the foundation וּבִצְעִיר֖וֹ <WH6810> and in his youngest יַצִּ֥יב <WH5324> [son] shall he set up דְּלָתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1817> the gates

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> So the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> was with יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> was with Joshua וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become שָׁמְע֖וֹ <WH8089> and his fame בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> was [noised] throughout all the country
